name: ZoomHaitiNews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ZoomHaitiNews is a professional and non-partisan News Company based in the United States and Haiti. We publish articles on a regular basis on our websites https://zoomhaitinews.com (published in French) and translations of the same content on our local sites. 

News in English can be access via this Skill and on our English content website : https://zoominlivetv.com/

We have reporters in all of the 10 departments (States) of Haiti. 
We also have representatives in Brazil, Dominican Republic, Chile, and Canada. Our contents are available on our TV Channels (Roku, Amazon Fire TV) , Android Apps ( Google PlayStore and Amazon App Store), YouTube, Vimeo, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram . Our articles can be read of 104 languages on our website network.

ZoomHaïtiNews is a space for meetings, exchanges and debates for all those who wish to make their contribution to building a prosperous Haiti, to the delight of Haitians and the Caribbean people. At ZoomHaitiNews, we prioritize the people who have contributed to the development of Haitian and Caribbean heritage. We strive to tell and present Haiti and the world from the perspective of Haitians and Caribbean people.

Contact: contact@zoomhaititv.com/ zoomhaitinews@gmail.com

This Skill is part of the Caribbean Television Network (CTN) ( https://caribbeantelevisionnetwork.com/)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
